column5: I AM LOOKING FOR A GOOD LAKE FOR SMALLMOUTH FISHING WITHIN 3 HRS NORTH OF THE BORDER OF USA IN CANADA (THOUSAND ISLAND BRIDGE)THANKS FOR YOUR HELP!

Lake Simcoe boasts some of the best smallmouth fishing in southern Ontario. Many are in the 2-4lb class with a 6+ quite common. Its just 45min north of Toronto.ChrisFishing Lake Simcoehttp://www.fishinglakesimcoe.com
